content: Chao Huang is now a research assistant in the Chinese University of Hong Kong, advised by Prof. Chi-Wing Fu. He got the B.Eng. from ESE Department, Nanjing University in 2019, working with Prof. Zhan Ma. Actively looking for Phd position.
summary: Chao Huang is now a research assistant in the Chinese University of Hong Kong, advised by Prof. Chi-Wing Fu. He got the B.Eng. from ESE Department, Nanjing University in 2019, working with Prof. Zhan Ma. Actively looking for Phd position.
title: Chao Huang

summary: Accepted to IEEE VCIP 2019 as an oral presentation
title: Extreme Image Compression via Multiscale Autoencoders With Generative Adversarial Optimization
